title: Add nn::iterator()
body_html:
Summary:
Adding a nn::iterator function that can be used to traverse both a dataflow graph and a controlflow graph.

Usage:
for (auto& node : nn::iterate(nn->dataFlow)) {
}
and
for (const auto& instr : nn::iterate(nn->controlFlow)) {
}

It handles node deletion in graph by skipping the deleted node in the internal vector of the custom container (NodeVector).
It also handles instruction order when traversing control flow graph.

Differential Revision: D8796474
